lines.text: You take it away... to show them what they had.
Everyone has a box.
Just because you broke into people's homes doesn't mean you need to look like a fucking burglar.
[first lines]

The following is my explanation. Well, more of an account of what happened. I'd been on my own for a while and getting kind of lonely... and bored... nothing to do all day. And that's when I started shadowing.
Shadowing?
Shadowing - Following. I started to follow people
Who?
Anyone at first. Um,
[sniffs]
you know, that was the whole point - somebody at random, someone who didn't know who I was.
And then?
And then nothing.
When I started to follow people, specific people, when I selected a person to follow, that's when the trouble started.
And when it stopped being random, that's when it started to go wrong.
You're developing a taste for it - the violating, the voyeurism... it's definitely you.
So what's a girl like you...
Doing in a place like this?
...doing with a bald old cunt like that?

[finding a house key under its doormat]
Bing-fucking-go.
[last lines]
Is this your handwriting?
Yes
That's it, unless you have any questions.
Jesus Christ! Do you think they believed you?
Of course they didn't fucking believe me!
They rifled through my underwear.
Were you, uh, "working" for him at the time?
That... is none of your business.
[gets up to leave]
I think you'd better find somebody else to start telling you little stories.
Oh come on, I was just joking!
